items.name: Vaughan Homestead
items.description: This noteworthy historical centre is situated on Auckland's North Shore in Long Bay. It has been a piece of the network since early European settlement. George Vaughan and his relatives utilised the cabin farmhouse as their estate for a long time, cultivating around 2000 sections of land and its surrounding areas. Following quite a long while of restorative work, the residence was changed into a network exhibition hall which is opened to people in general by appointment or in chosen hours.
